name: I SPENT 24 HOURS in QATAR QSUITES
description:
Today i'm flying on one of the world's longest flights (an inaugural too!) and then.. another! I'll be in the sky over 24 hours in the world's best Business Class, the Qatar QSuites. I won't be doing it alone either, I'll have one of my buddies James Asquith with me as well as a new friend, Diego the dog! From airport to airport we're looking at over 31 hours today, and I'm sure we'll get into some adventures along the way. 

Go check out my buddy James' new YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCqU2YGi4Jcdlx8sHsq0VRVQ

Follow my travels on my IG: will.luxurytravel

------------

Qatar QSuites
Qatar A350
Qatar 777
Qatar Business Class
World's Best Business Class
